Despite being pregnant, she continues to work on the case and does not let her condition hinder her abilities as a detective. Instead, she uses her empathy and communication skills to effectively communicate with witnesses and suspects, showing that her gender does not affect her performance in her job.

He respects their abilities and contributions to the team, including Amy Foster and Detective Sergeant Joe Stephens.
